casebody.data:
CHURCH OF SCIENTOLOGY INTERNATIONAL, petitioner,
v.
Laura Ann DeCRESCENZO, et al. No. 12-1495. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 7, 2013.

Motion of Rutherford Institute for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Motion of National Council of Churches of Christ, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Second Appellate District, denied.
